content: --ग्रहः, --पिशाचः, --पुरुषः, --रक्षस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} --राक्षसः a kind of ghost, the ghost of a Brāhmaṇa, who during his life time indulges in a disdainful spirit and carries away the wives of others and the property of Brāhmaṇas; (परस्य योषितं हृत्वा ब्रह्मस्वमपहृत्य च . अरण्ये निर्जले देशे भवति ब्रह्मराक्षसः .. <ls>Y. 3. 212</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 12. 60</ls> also).
